name: Power Traveller Falcon 7 Solar Panel
description: Efficient and lightweight, this travel-friendly solar panel keeps your devices powered up anywhere under the sun. The rugged polyester fabric lets you fold it up for convenient storage and the IPX4 water resistance means it can handle splashes when out on the trail. Plug directly into the USB port to start charging or pair with your favorite powerbank for stored power on the go.Monocrystalline solar panel.Solar capacity is to 7W.USB port (output) is 5V up to 1.4A.LED power indicator.Panel has IPX4 water resistance.Lash points let you easily attach the panel to a pack, tent or panniers.Folds to 15.7 x 17.9 x 1.1cm for storage.Includes Falcon 7 solar panel, USB-C to USB cable, female USB-C to male micro USB adapter, 2 carabiners.
